platforms.title: Kaggle
platforms.description: Kaggle is the world's largest data science community with powerful tools and resources to help you achieve your data science goals

platforms.title: Driven Data
platforms.description: DrivenData works on projects at the intersection of data science and social impact, in areas like international development, health, education, research and conservation, and public services.

platforms.title: Codalab
platforms.description: Codalab is is an open-source web-based platform that enables researchers, developers, and data scientists to collaborate, with the goal of advancing research fields where machine learning and advanced computation is used

platforms.title: Crowd ANALYTIX Community
platforms.description: The CrowdANALYTIX Community: where data experts collaborate & compete to build & optimize AI, ML, NLP and Deep Learning algorithms

platforms.title: KDD Cup
platforms.description: KDD Cup is the annual Data Mining and Knowledge Discovery competition organized by ACM Special Interest Group on Knowledge Discovery and Data Mining, the leading professional organization of data miners

platforms.title: Zindi
platforms.description: Zindi gives African data scientists a place to learn new skills, grow through our competitions and our community and access work opportunities

platforms.title: Machine Learning Contests
platforms.description: Discover ongoing machine learning competitions/data science contests across Kaggle, DrivenData, AICrowd, and other platforms

platforms.title: ML Boot Camp
platforms.description: Machine Learning and Data Analysis contests

platforms.title: Boosters.pro
platforms.description: The largest platform for holding contests concerning data analysis in Russia and Eastern Europe
